"Ugh, Ms. Treadwell is so strict, and she gives so much homework! I mean, who does she think she is?" a bossy, arrogant tone emanated from a short distance. Probably a snobby rich girl. Rebecca had a few experiences with these type of people.

"Yeah, you're soooo right. I can't remember the last time I've had the time to relax." This time, the voice was soother and less high-pitched than the previous one. Rebecca reckoned it was a calmer, sophisticated book smart or a scholar. She wouldn't be surprised if it was a valedictorian. She held her tongue, however, as to not reveal her presence. "It's hard enough that we have to study for exams, let alone do chores at home. But, Ms. Treadwell is a kind woman. I find it hard to loathe her just because she hands out so many projects." Rebecca could discern a scoff. "It's true! She gave us chocolate last week. Plus, she's better than Mr. Calvin. I could deal without his lectures and his distasteful attitude. I mean, why does he come to school if it's just to torment poor students?"

A third Musketeer chimed in. "Yeah, but he's soooo hot! He could lecture me all day if it means I can stare at his chiseled jaw and chest! Oh boy, he can have me any day of the week! Plus, you know he's very skilled at what he does..."

"Yeah, I've heard that he got a girl to laugh so hard she couldn't stop smiling for the rest of the month!"

Rebecca's eyebrows furrowed. Why would a teacher make a student laugh that hysterically? Was there something going on that she didn't know about? She thought this was a private school where education was placed in top priority. This wasn't a circus. But then an incident transpired that almost made her choke.

"Hey, what's this bag doing here?" Rebecca crouched to get a better view and was aghast to see the three girls poking at her plastic bag. "This wasn't here a few minutes ago. Could someone have forgotten it here?"

"Go see what's in it," another suggested. "There might be loot in there."

"Those are just clothes. They look foreign, though. Whoever left this here must have poor taste in style, or left it purposely here to disgust whoever picks it up." Another round of laughter while Rebecca fumed internally. Those article of clothing were worth a considerable amount at Victoria's Secret. "This looks pretty recent and worn. Maybe someone changed in one of the stalls..."

'Oh no, they can't find out I'm here!' Rebecca expressed her worries in her head. 'Maybe if I make a run for it, I could dodge everyone in my way and get out of here. But it's very risky seeing as there's a lot of people. If I stay here and pray they don't check, then I'd be safe.'
1252.title: Hiding

choices: Uh oh...The three girls start checking each individual stall.
What the hell? Metallic cuffs are popping out of her stall! Robotic torture?
12522.content:
Rebecca tried to prep herself for a quick getaway, but doubled over and stopped dead in her tracks. She let out an inward sigh; the brunette couldn't muster the courage to do such a thing. There was also a slight tug in her head that restrained her from conducting such a cowardly move. After all, she was the type of woman to face her problems head on instead of running away. The juvenile delinquent might have tossed away her interest of school and exams, but that didn't mean that she was going to give up on her self-respect, or whatever remained of it. No, she had to remain where she was and deal with the aftermath. Rebecca pressed her ear against the door.

"Hmm...do we have to investigate this? I mean, we have other stuff to do than play Scooby-doo with this mystery bag," the book smart's voice resonated lavishly. "We're supposed to be seniors. We can't afford a stain to our reputation."

"Yeah, but you know the rules, Vanessa. We have to report any abnormalities to a superior and find out as much as possible on the matter," the haughty girl reasoned. Clearly, she was not backing down on the affair. "What if this ordeal escalates into a bedlam if we leave it untouched? We would be the ones responsible for it all since we didn't lift a finger to aid. Our punishment will be more severe than we can ever imagine. Detention is bad enough, but they'd go even farther...like...like..." Rebecca could hear the condescending student's voice falter for the first time. What could be so frightening to leave the broad at a loss for words? "You wouldn't think they'd send us to the Chamber?! Oh god, they totally will! We'll be tortured there for the rest of our lives! I can't bear the thought of those hands touching me on my weak spots! Oh god, oh god, oh god! And the feathers too! It's like a gateway to a harrowing nightmare!"

The two companions shrieked and nearly fainted at the notion. They both knew what awaited there at the pit of Hell. Vanessa gulped and grabbed their attention. "This is only hearsay, but I've heard the only girl to ever walk in that Chamber was a senior troublemaker. She was only put on probation after a month and her attitude did a complete 180. She never stirred up trouble again, but the look on her face was that of horror and constant paranoia. Oh lord, if they managed to crack a tough girl like her, they'd have no trouble going through us."

A feeling of uneasiness was orally transmitted to the hidden brown-haired virgin. This didn't sound like the perfect school she envisioned. This sounded like a campfire horror story that most likely held some truth. It only served as a reminder to eminently get the hell out of this war zone. Reflexively, Rebecca's ragged breath systematically doubled its pace.

"What's that noise? Is someone there?"

'Oh shit. Smart move, Rebecca. I'm so stupid. I'm retarded. An absolute moron.' Said brunette clasped her hand against her untamed mouth while slowly backing up from the door of her stall. That was probably the last straw to her demise.

"Maybe that was just your imagination, Vanessa," the third wheel shrugged.

"Or maybe the person who dropped this bag is still lurking around somewhere..." the malignant lass added her two cents.

"I'm positive I heard a noise. I think it stemmed from one of those stalls," the Velma of the group pointed out. "After all, you know stalls are a great hiding place in any situation. But of course, it's the oldest one in the book, so you mustn't rely on it too much. Especially considering how the rich principal designed them - there is no escape once you're caught in there."

Rebecca's heart began throbbing faster than a sprinter at the Olympics. She was wondering what they were referring to with 'how the principal designed them'. In any event, she had to stay still and not cause further hubbub. Her throat was red raw, her eyelids were shut tight, her legs were quivering like Jello and her stomach was churning with unbearable trepidation like a martyr that was awaiting their fate. The room grew quiet - too quiet - to the point that Rebecca pondered if the trio was still nearby.

Then, while her guard was dropped, it happened.
12522.title: Be Quiet

choices: We're taking you to the principal.
125221.content:
"Well, looks like it can't be helped. It seems like whomever made that muffled noise is too scared to show their true face. That or I've finally been driven to insanity. In any case, we'll have to go through every stall, one by one," the group eyed each other and communicated through sign language. That look Vanessa gave was one that roughly translated to: "You watch my back while I open the door. I don't want to get sucker punched and ruin my fabulous makeup." Yes, the book smart was also very fond of cosmetics and aesthetics. The three shared a mutual understanding and the brave one of the pack wasted no time in her sleuthing.

Meanwhile, Rebecca was sweating bullets in her little hiding spot. The cat was out of the bag now and there was no turning back. The reverberation of doors being slammed open almost scared her half to death. It was hard to accept such a cruel fate, but she was trapped. Nowhere to run, nowhere to hide. She had the pleasurable experience of awaiting her death sentence.

It didn't take very long. The ladies' room only contained six stalls, and, much to Rebecca's migraine, her's was at the far end, meaning they saved the best for last. The suspense was enough to kick her instincts into overdrive as she heard the stall next to her being checked. It was her turn, but she didn't want to lose without a fight. Adding to the lock of her door, the brunette maintained a firm hold over the handle. If it took every last bit of her strength, the teen was desperate to use her whole, underage body as a meat shield to preserve her secrecy. A rough pull was all she needed to know that the seniors were on the other end of her stall.

"Hey, this one won't budge one bit. I think there really is someone in here," the bossy ingénue noted, combining her left and right hand as a last ditch effort to pry the door open. "Give me a hand here, girls."

Rebecca was at her wits' end. Her arms complained at her tedious task and could barely hold much longer. 'Can't. Give. Up!'

"Grrrr! All at once, girls! One. Two. Three. Pull! There! It's starting to give in! Come on, girls! Just one last pull! We're almost there!" The gritted teeth and heaving made it look like an intense rowing competition. Of course, to have three individuals pitted against our protagonist was an evident overkill, and Rebecca's muscles caved in at long last. "Ha. Took you long enough to give up."

Within the depths of the excruciating stall was but a measly student. Rebecca stood there, sheepishly rubbing her head as she faced three fuming, but mildly intrigued women. "U-um, hello there. I hope you didn't break your hands on the way in. Ha ha..." Now that her shelter was unearthed, Rebecca got a glimpse of whom she was dealing with. The sassy-looking one - whom she assumed to be the arrogant, spoiled brat - had long, wavy blond hair. Her eyes were green like emerald, and she had an unimpressed expression. The shortest one appeared more inquisitive than angry. She was a ginger with much paler skin than her own. She had trouble seeing her as a senior seeing as she looked younger than everyone in the room. The third towered over her associates. Raven hair with a tinge of violet? Interesting choice of color. Her arms were folded and she stared at her with impassiveness.

"You have some nerve to hide yourself here during class. I've never seen you before, but that uniform tells me that you're a freshman," the blonde one voiced her thoughts albeit with more malice than intended. "Do you have any idea of the offense you just committed?"

'They can tell I'm a freshman from my uniform? Hold on, their own uniform aren't even remotely as revealing as mine!' Rebecca growled. It was true, the Three Stooges were dressed in a formal attire. Full length blue shirts, skirts that fit their hips and ebony leather shoes. It just wasn't fair! How come newcomers had to expose themselves explicitly!

The tall, black-haired gal stepped in. "We'll take your silence as a 'no' then. We don't know how long you've been here, but your behavior warrants some punishment. In this school, you should know exactly what that means."

Looking back, Rebecca should have kept her mouth shut. Better yet, sewed it completely. "What would that be?"
125221.title: Caught Red-handed

1252211.content:
The three older ladies shared a surreptitious smile. They've longed for a chance to exact punishment since the very beginning of their school year. How serendipitous and magnanimous for this newbie to volunteer for their yearning delight! The blonde 'princess' took the initiative, wishing to educate the gutsy newcomer about the school system. "Instead of explaining, how about we just show you?" Vanessa ushered her out of the stall and guided her toward a nearby disentangled concrete wall. The third lackey seized the opportunity to lock the exit door, effectively putting a lid on any escape attempt. "Pin her down, girls. Any sort of resistance shall be added to her report card."

Rebecca felt herself being pushed into a corner. "You can't do this. You're students too, right? Shouldn't you be letting the teachers or an authoritative figure deal with this issue? This is against the law!" She was grasping for straws at this point.

"If it were any other student, you'd be correct," Vanessa interjected. Restraining the younger lass was of no trouble for a woman of her calibre. Her trusty cuffs were easily attached to the captive's wrists and intertwined to a pipe which served as a rack. "Unfortunately for you, you're dealing with the Student Council President and a Valedictorian. We are rightfully trained and authorized to deliver punishment when necessary. I'm afraid you're out of luck if you're looking for mercy or redemption; you've been caught on the felony."

"You can't be serious. Skipping class is considered a felony here?" Rebecca demanded, baffled that something so trivial was the equivalent of robbing a bank. It simply didn't make sense, and her consciousness wondered whether or not they were forging this information on the spot.

The ginger and the lengthy nerd had just finished making the configurations to the restraints. Rebecca's ankles were now bound to a crisscrossing pipeline, bringing about the final nail to her coffin as her movement was that of a paralyzed woman. A tint of rose decorated her cheeks upon realizing her very uptight and vulnerable position. Her posture left her wholly outstretched to the point that her ribs protruded out of her midsection. How convenient for them to have a high pipe to trap her in. The brunette hadn't scarcely been stretched out like this since cheerleading practice and sporadic yoga sessions. Her pale stomach was taut and accentuated her in-betweenie belly button, her legs were straight and her spine was aching in response to the uncomfortable chance of stance. She wished she had been clad in her old attire which at least covered more grounds. The sleeveless top made almost her entire torso susceptible, and her damned skirt was dangling dangerously low on her hipbones. Rebecca could have mistaken it as her birthday suit.

The pressure in the air seemed ample enough to choke her out. Of course, her captors didn't have the same perspective. They were fortunate to have a full view of her exposed, virgin body that was up for grabs.

"This has to be one sick, twisted joke. You'll be hearing from my parents after this is done," the hapless fledgling hissed.

"This isn't a joke, but we'll get you something to laugh at," Cinderella-wanna-be snarled, digging her polished nails in Rebecca's perfect, hairless armpits. Now this came as a surprise for the brown-haired damsel who expected a violent turnabout. The spontaneous worming only incited Goldilocks to continue as it was exactly what she was looking for. Her victim was very ticklish indeed. Perfect. "As you may have guessed, the punishment accorded to delinquents is tickle torture. Let's see where your weak spots are!"

Rebecca's mind was overloaded with swearing and lament. Out of everything that they could have inflicted, it just had to be tickling - one of her utmost humiliating weaknesses! The fingernails on her smooth underarms were of excruciating essence. They drew and skated figure eights on her appealing canvas while she found it more and more demanding to hold back her mirth.

"She is a tough one, isn't she? I can commend that. However, it's only a matter of time before her wall of aloofness caves in," Vanessa said, savoring the eye candy that was Rebecca's toned, swiveling tummy. She simply could not resist the urge to graze her hand over the delicate, erogenous area. She was overjoyed by the response - what a reaction she got! Rebecca's bare midriff crinkled at the uninvited touch, resulting in her sucking it in to avoid the curious digits. That was the confirmation Vanessa needed to give in to her desires. Her fingers took a reign of their own and joined in on the fun.

'Oh no! Not my stomach!' was all Rebecca could think of at that moment. Vanessa's claw-like hands roamed freely on her sides and tickled her flanks with lobster grips. Why was she so damn sensitive? A rush of adrenaline flowed through her veins, but she wasn't going to give those freaks what they wanted. Her teeth were grinding against each other as a display of stubbornness. Little by little, however, she was losing the battle. No laughter yet, although the occasional 'Eep' and shudder would reappear.

Suddenly, Rebecca felt a pinch on her thigh. She narrowed her eyes and gave a sorrowful look to the ginger which said 'Please don't'. The latter was feeling left out and decided to try out the prisoner's lower body.

"Wow, I've never seen someone so resilient. You just don't know when to quit," Vanessa whistled, clearly impressed. Throughout her experience, she had been in the girl's shoes before. Even she would have given up at this point.

"No kidding," her ecstatic blond colleague added, "but it's about to come to a close."

Hitherto that statement, they were only testing out the reactions in order to draw out the nerve endings. Now that they knew precisely where they were abundantly located, they had no more reasons to hold back. The platinum blond schoolgirl was the first to kick things into overdrive by accelerating the speed of her fingers over the center of Rebecca's armpits where she savvied the presence of a pool of nerve endings. She basked in the brunette's anguish as her phalanges tasted the succulent pits of ticklishness. On the other end, the ginger gleefully assailed Rebecca's legs. They weren't as sensitive as the rest of the body, but she was the appetizer of the delicious main ticklish course. Vanessa marveled the scenery of Rebecca's creamy white stomach like it was love at first sight. It was definitely off the charts in terms of sensitivity. She had a lot of room to work with; her hands raked and skidded all over the lean, frontal abdomen like she was practicing on her piano. No matter how many times Rebecca attempted to suck her belly in, Vanessa ascertained to hit the right keys.

The miserable freshman looked like she was on the verge of exploding like a firework. Tears formed at the corner of her eyes. Giggles flew out of her mouth without her consent. At least she could say she tried her best.

"Err....n-no...hee hee hee! Stop touching meehehehehe!" Rebecca hated the sound of her laugh. It was so girlish and unfitting in her opinion. She didn't want to sound like a feminine schoolgirl even though she technically was one. The triad didn't slow their efforts in the least. Her tummy was aching so terribly from holding back her guffaws, coupled with the incessant fingers kneading her hypersensitive stomach. Ah, screw it. She raised the white flag. "HAA HAAHA AHHAA! OK OK! I GET IHIHIHIHIT! YOU CAN STOHOhOHOP NOW!"

"There's that laugh I wanted!" Blondie smirked mischievously. She had surmounted her obstacle once more.

Vanessa nodded in agreement. It was music to her ears, and her nails didn't feel like withdrawing just yet. The concerto was not over. "We're not done with you just yet. We need to ensure that you've properly learnt your lesson." She lowered her gaze toward Rebecca's entrancing hips and opted to donate a tickling hand there. "You should be grateful that we don't report your misconduct to the principal."

"PLEAHEEEHESE! I'LL DO ANYTHIHIHIING!" Rebecca couldn't believe the words that came out of her mouth. This wasn't the stone hard, strong-willed girl she knew and loved. She would make them pay for turning her into this damsel in distress!

"Pleading already? Don't be such a baby. After all, tickling is very entertaining for both sides."

"Yeah. Besides, those nipples don't lie," one of the tormentors retorted, seeing two hard nudges poking out of Rebecca's tight shirt. "Tell us the truth. You verily want us to continue, don't you! Don't you!"
1252211.title: No Mercy

12522112.content:
Rebecca's tears trickled like waterfalls as she wasn't even able to respond to the damned miscreant! The tall dark-haired book smart had a shit-eating grin, aware of the brunette's plight. The torturer brandished her nails and fanned them out in assault mode when she and her companions heard a sound they knew all too well.

Ding. Dong. Ding. Dong.

A chorus of disgruntled moans followed suit. "Damn it. Just when it was about to get good too. Janet, why didn't you keep track of time while we were exacting punishment? We're all going to be late now!"

"Me? What about Audrey?" the ginger pouted, tired of being the punching bag once more.

"Whatever. It matters not," Vanessa interjected. "For now, we'll have to go to class. I'll come up with a valid excuse to convince the teacher of our impromptu tardiness. In the meantime, Janet, go get our belongings. We'll meet you in class." There was no room for arguing. Rebecca watched the pale, freckled minion exit wordlessly and made a subtle motion to leave as well. That didn't go unnoticed by the valedictorian who raised an accusing finger at her throat, putting a lid on her attempt to escape. "And where do you think you're going? You haven't been pardoned for your crime."

"Oh come on. Haven't you done enough already?" Rebecca blurted out, frustrated. "How many times do I have to say this already? I'm sorry for breaking your dumb law. I'm new here, so I don't know how you fancy pants operate. Cut me some slack." If only it were that simple for the newbie.

"Absolutely not. Your behavior warrants supervision and proper rehabilitation. We can't let you off the hook that easily." The message was clear. Vanessa grabbed - or rather snatched vehemently - Rebecca's wrist and ushered her through the door with the now-identified Audrey tagging behind.

The transfer student didn't like being ordered around like a little girl scout, and she definitely didn't like being dragged around. "Where are you taking me? Can you tell me that at least?"

A faint smirk grew on Vanessa's face. "Under normal circumstances, you would directly be escorted to the principal. However, considering you're new to the establishment, I know just the person that will show you the ropes..." She took an abrupt turn to an infamous corridor of the school grounds - one which you never leave unscathed after visiting. The dark-haired prodigy almost felt bad for taking the newcomer there, but it was for her own good.

"Looks like we're here. Don't worry, you'll be delighted to meet..."
12522112.title: Saved By The Bell

125221121.content:
The room's walls seemed newly painted in snow white - a recurring theme that Rebecca picked up on. Maybe she wasn't far off when comparing the school to a Greek architecture. The decoration was rather lackluster: a desk with piled documents, arbitrary flowers and a little window offering a mediocre look of the school's playground. What did pique her interest was the metallic rack which sparked goosebumps on the girl's skin. She knew exactly that she was led into the spider's web.

"Hello, Ms. Treadwell. It has been a long time since we've seen each other," the black-haired devil surprisingly greeted.

"Oh, goodness. It's been years since you've come, Vanessa. I thought you had forgotten about little ol' me." The figure was tall, even taller than the senior giant herself. Although, so were the benefits of wearing 6 inch heels. She adorned grey hair and a voluptuous body. She definitely had a few loose screws."You've grown into such a fine lady. I wonder if you're still as ticklish...Have you come for nostalgic purposes?"

At this, Rebecca's eyes widened. The valedictorian? Ticklish? Unheard of. Her hopes of entertainment were shot down by her escort's reply, however. "As much as I'd like to catch up with you, I'm strictly here for business."

Ms. Treadwell's expression turned to that of curiosity. "You must be talking about your little friend here. It's always nice to meet other people. I assume she has done something to trigger this meeting, yes?" She took a moment to absorb all the information from Vanessa. "Ho? Sneaking out during class? Refusing to take responsibility for her actions? Patronizing our beloved Student Council? Disrupting order? My, what a naughty brat we have in our hands." Rebecca felt beady eyes scanning her partially naked body and she looked away sheepishly. "Naughty but pretty. We'll have to fix that attitude at once. Take her to the rack."

The skimpily-clad teenager was powerless to stop the combined strength of the counselor and the prideful student who had no issue in lifting her light weight. Immediately, her limbs were secured inside the cuffs, and Rebecca was stretched in a spread-eagle position. The bondage was horizontal, so she was facing the ceiling. Once again, the unnerved brunette was turned into a damsel - her least favorite role in any sort of play.

"Your job here is done, Vanessa. Fret not, I will ensure that this lassie aligns with our ideals. You should be heading to class now. Feel free to stop by in the future. My doors will always be open to my favorite victim..."

"Very well," said girl responded, slightly crept out by the adult's eerie tone. "As they say, the ball is in your court now. Try not to break this one as you've done to others in the past. She holds untouched potential."

"We shall see, my dear." Rebecca didn't like the sound of that.
125221121.title: Hate At First Sight

choices: Maybe tickling will cheer her up.
1252211211.content:
The sound of a lock clicking was all Rebecca needed to know to confirm her demise. There went her plan of absconding through the door. Despite her quick judgment and calculative mind, even she couldn't figure out a way out of the situation. She arched her head to glance at the window which was her only feeling of liberty. She sighed and slumped her back against the rack; the frame was too condensed for her to pull through. Succumbing to defeat was very unlike her, but what else could she do?

Rebecca tilted her head in vicinity of her new acquaintance. The strange counselor was browsing through her file cabinets until the woman pulled out a blank sheet of paper, a clipboard and a pencil. Oh boy, not even a day in and she was already receiving therapy. Ms. Treadwell seemed to emanate a foul aura as she pulled a chair next to the brunette.

"Well then, dear, it's about time we get to know each other on a personal level," the older lady began. "I'm Misty Treadwell, and, as you may have guessed, I am the school counselor. Now, how about you tell me about yourself?"

"And if I don't?" Rebecca challenged, sounding braver than she actually was.

"Oh? Then let's see where you are ticklish." Ms. Treadwell dug into Rebecca's armpits with gusto, tickling away any sort of rebellion rising from the girl. The unexpected assault elicited an "eep" from the restrained hooligan as the latter twisted around and tugged at her wrists. The counselor had a wry smile; the rack was made out of pure steel - the most rigid and resistant metal. She couldn't pull her arms down even in the slightest, allowing free control of her responsive nerve endings.

"Nooohohoho! Anything but tickling!" Rebecca threw her head back and erupted with laughter. Her damn shirt was sleeveless! She cursed the designer for exposing her weak spots like this. Now, her underarms were experiencing the hellish wiggling of the counselor's fingers. Rebecca's eyes widened as she felt a soft spot at the center of her left armpit being grazed. Her tormentor caught her surprised look and wasted no time in exploiting her weakness, compelling poor Rebecca into hysteria. "Nyaahahha! Noo! Don't touch me there! Ohhhh gawhahahad!"

Twelve minutes had passed. The tickling was over. Rebecca finally drew breaths once more as her body sagged. Ms. Treadwell was scribbling down notes while eying her lovely guest.

"Are you ready to cooperate now?" she asked, covertly hoping the girl would say no.

Swallowing her pride, Rebecca ultimately submitted. "Fine. Just don't freaking touch me. I hate being tickled." Her whole body was sweaty, and her arms still twitched. How she loathed being so ticklish.

"What brings you to our school, then?"

"I...had no choice coming here," Rebecca started shakily. "I used to go to a completely different school for several months. Apparently, my parents transferred me without my knowledge nor consent. All they've told me was that they were leaving on vacation for a year. Now, here I am. Inside a school I don't know, people I don't know and tortured by damn perverts!" She looked away, unable to tame the anger boiling inside of her.

"Do you resent your parents because of their decision?" Ms. Treadwell continued, ignoring the derisive comment at the end. She was rewarded with utter silence. "Come on, sweetie. I need to know about your inner feelings if you want me to help you. Silent treatment won't help you or me." Her hands found a nesting place at the girl's bare stomach. "Or would you rather be tickled...?"

"No!" Rebecca shouted stormily. The sudden touch on her midriff made her flinch. She sucked her abdomen in whilst the counselor simply brushed her forefinger back and forth on her skin. It didn't tickle badly - only making her squirm when certain spots were reached. "Cut that out. I've already told you everything about me."

"We've only scratched the surface, darling. I can tell you have what we call teenage angst. You keep your anger bottled up inside which is unhealthy for a young girl like you. You hate your parents for making decisions you don't like. However, you must understand they're doing it for your own good." Rebecca refused to look her in the eyes, though deep down, she knew she was right. "Be happy! You can't stay grumpy like this forever! I'm sure that's what your parents want."

Rebecca fumed at this. "You clearly haven't met them. They can go to hell for all I care."
1252211211.title: Therapy Session.

choices: A pitfall into an underground den of webs and perverted spider monsters.
An ancient ruin full of booby traps and creatures.
Fallen into a deep lake where sea creatures dwell beneath.
13.content:
Last night, Rebecca had done her homework, surfed the internet a bit, took a hot bubble bath, brushed her teeth, and went straight to bed.

So, what happened?

She was now awake with a terrified and befuddled first impression at what she was seeing. Surrounded by tall trees, plants, and grass with a blue, partly cloudy, sky, the girl was experiencing culture shock. Sunny, beautiful environment, lovely temperature, but this wasn't home!

How did she get here and more importantly, how can she leave? She hadn't the slightly clue in which direction to start walking towards.

Nothing would be gained in simply sitting here in the patch of soft grass. Rebecca stood up, brushed off any dirt on her clothes, and cautiously walked in a random direction, hoping to at least find a man-made pathway that could lead her to some people for help.

However, where will she really end up walking towards?
13.title: Abducted By Nature

131.content:
Rebecca kept walking in a straight line without a clue in the world about the strange sentient plants that lived among these trees. As she wandered in the woods, her eyes spotted wire-thin vines that started to move around her. The tip of the vine poked her back lightly which made her giggle softly. She turned around and no one was there. The vine turned and tapped her shoulder which made turn around again as if something was pulling a prank on her. The vines returned back into the bushes followed by a voice that sounded like a girl giggling.

It brought her delight at the thought of there being someone else nearby. She could ask for directions and possibly answers to the myriad of questions that lingered in her mind. She followed the vines, being lured into a small open patch of grass where a weird-looking plant rooted deeply into the earthy soil. The blue flower head was the size of yoga ball along with a mouth, similar to a Venus Flytrap.

No one seemed to be around, leading to a much confused look on her face, but before she could do anything, a vine wrapped around her waist and lifted her off the ground with ease. She squealed a bit from the sudden shock. Another vine slipped into the heel of her shoes, pulling them down and off her small, tender bare-feet.
